ned the door, he much better than he

WHEELIE paused.  This particular se=
tup confused him a great deal.  While he would assume Rodimus was familiar =
with how an Earthern medical facility was setup, he would not think that th=
e medics here who were treating him would have made such an exact match, or=
 even set it up according to such parameters if they had no datatracts.

Wh=
eelie's menaderings within his processor were cut off over by the gesticula=
tions from Rodimus as he responded, "You're in bed.  You look like you aske=
d Grimlock to dance on your head."
